description: The Scriptures app will read Christian scripture passages from the Bible, Book of Mormon, and Doctrine and Covenants of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints.  The King James version of the Bible is used.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask The Scriptures to read Mark chapter 2.
Alexa, tell The Scriptures to give me inspiration.
name: The Scriptures
shortDescription: Listen to Alexa read inspirational scriptures to you.
